Package rationalpiano.input

Interface Summary
IKeyInput Provides callback methods for pressing and releasing keyboard keys.
IMouseInput Provides callback methods for pressing and releasing mouse buttons.
 

Class Summary
InputDevs Manages Input from Mouse, Keyboard, MIDI and Multitouch.
InputMidi Receives Midi Notes and CC Messages for Sustain.
TuioInput Manages TUIO Multitouch input and de/activates the according voices and notes
